rows.label: qev051508_MSG0001
rows.name:
How are you feeling? In top condition?
Are your muscles taut and your soul ablaze?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051508_MSG0003
rows.name:
A warrior of your grade is ever ready for battle.
You live your life as a drawn sword.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051508_MSG0004
rows.name:
I know the lifestyle well, having lived it myself alongside
Gi Zang's old manâ€”he of the Hundred Hellions fame.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051508_MSG0005
rows.name:
I apologize for not introducing myself sooner.
As you know, my name is Zo Ozuchi.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051508_MSG0006
rows.name:
But what you do not know is that I am the winner of
three Wrothian gauntlets, and the only one to have
lived through a fight with Gi Zang's grandfather.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051508_MSG0007
rows.name: And today, I am your opponent in the final round![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051508_MSG0008
rows.name:
I did not dream that I would find a fighter of your
caliber in this foreign land, [ST:playername ].[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051508_MSG0009
rows.name:
Let us place our lives on the line and pit muscle,
bone, sinew, and soul against one another.
For that alone is the reason our kind draws breath![ST:wait ]
